bandwidth.desc: Bandwidth of the WiFi signal. Default is 20 MHz

channel.desc: Wireless channel used in the 5.0 GHz range

scnum_start.desc: starting subcarrier number music/bartlett. Total subcarriers 30, start 0, mid 15, end  30

scnum_end.desc: end subcarrier number music/bartlett. Total subcarriers 30

topN_count.desc: Top N AOA angles to return from AOA profile

true_tx_positions.desc: True groundtruth positions of TX for checking accuracy

other_robot_ID.desc: MAC-IDs of other robots (denoted as signal transmitters tx) in the team

input_TX_channel_csi_fn.desc: Forward channel csi File for each of the neighboring TX robots

input_RX_channel_csi_fn.desc: Reverse channel csi File stored on the RX robot which is performing 3D SAR

max_packets_to_process.desc: Maximum number of csi packets to process

min_packets_to_process.desc: Minimum number of csi packets to process

debug_dir.desc: dir to save intermediate data files for debugging

time_offset.desc: offset for time diff on different robots

time_threshold.desc: threshold for paring forward and backward channel

peak_radius.desc: radius of patch to ignore neighbor peak in degree

displacement_type.desc: Motion of robot: 2D, 3D. Impacts steering vector calculation for faster computation

antenna_position_offset.desc: offset between center of displacement center and antenna tip (meters)

top_N_magnitude.desc: Minumum magnitude of a peak with respect to the top peak (in precentage) in order to be considered in top N peaks

antenna_separation.desc: (meters) Used with complex conjugate channel formulation

aoa_estimator.desc: use one of the following estimators : bartlett

sub_sample_channel_data.desc: flag for enabling subsampling of channle data to reduce packet count

get_mean_pose_RX.desc: Get mean pose of the RX along its sub-trajectory

use_packet_id.desc: Match forward-reverse packets using packet id instead of timestamps

use_max_packets_threshold.desc: Flag to enable/disable max packet threshold

debug.desc: Flag to enable/disbale debug log messages

use_relative_trajectory.desc: Flag to enable/disbale usage of relative trajectory

use_two_antennas.desc: Use 2 antenna SAR formulation and complex conjugate to correct for CFO
